description: If you’re familiar at all with Commander, you’ll have heard a lot of talk about Ramp. If you’re newer to the game: Ramping is the term for spending your mana on sources of additional mana to use on later turns. Think of it like an investment; spend more mana now to have access to more […]
title: Magic: the Gathering Commander Focus: Talking 2-Cost Mana Rocks, Part 1 of 2

description: Your tabard hangs wet around your shoulders, heavy with sweat and blood. The final rays of sunlight can barely be seen, blocked out by the vast trees looming around you.
